name: VIAJE AL CENTRO DE LA AVENTURA
name_original: VIAJE AL CENTRO DE LA AVENTURA
description:
Here's our contribution to the LocJam! We hope you guys enjoy it!

Welcome to the crib!

A crib where four translators (we'll introduce ourselves right away) translate and localize Adventures from Another World into Spanish:

Laura Feijóo | EN-ES Translator | Videogames Localization

Franny Rodríguez | FR/EN-ES Translator | Videogames Localization

Daniel Reche | DE/EN-ES Translator | Audiovisual Translation

Lorea Moreno | EN/FR-ES Translator | Videogames Localization
